Title: Dark Cousin
Plot: Sister Mary Eunice is terrified to discover a dark angel at Briarcliff; Kit makes a bold move to be reunited with Grace.
ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, horror, sex scenes & offensive language
GuestStars: Frances Conroy, Fredric Lehne, William Mapother, Erin Allin O'Reilly, Sean Patrick Thomas
